body.name: FABULETTA Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 29Kpa Powerful Suction Up to 50 Min Runtime, 8 in 1 Lightweight Stick Vacuum Cleaner with Brushless Motor, Great for Pet Hair & Hard Floor (White with Blue)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 mins
features: STRONG SUCTION & ULTRA QUIET OPERATION：With a 300W brushless motor, Fabuletta cordless stick vacuum provides 29,000Pa of suction power on MAX mode, making it easy to capture debris, dust, pet hair, and more. Plus, it's ultra-quiet, generating only 63db of noise.

FREE-STANDING & MULTI-FUNCTION & LIGHTWEIGHT：Weighing only 3.5lb, this vacuum is perfect for one-hand cleaning. With a self-standing design and multiple accessories, it can be assembled into 6 different combinations to meet all your cleaning needs.

LONG-LASTING BATTERY & DETACHABLE DESIGN: With 7 x 2200 large-capacity rechargeable batteries, this stick vacuum cleaner cordless provides up to 50 minutes of cleaning time. Plus, the detachable battery can be charged singly or on its main body.

FLEXIBLE LED MOTORIZED BRUSH & LED DISPLAY：The 180° swivel brush and 3 LED lights make it easy to clean in all directions, while the LED display shows suction level, brush roller cleaning indication, and HEPA filter cleaning indication.

HIGH-EFFICIENCY FILTRATION SYSTEM：With all-new cyclone technology and high-density meshing, this vacuum can clean up to 99.99% of microscopic dust particles as small as 0.3 microns. Plus, the washable HEPA filter ensures purified air for your family. We offer 12-month 100% satisfactory after-sales service.

Special Features Retractable Metal Tube With the extensible wand, you can easily adjust it from 27'' to 35'', practical and save storage space. Two Charging Methods You can charge the stick vacuum directly or simply charge the separate part. With overcharge protection design, you can charge the vacuum overnight. One-click Dust Release Just one click of the button under the dustbin to empty the trash to avoid getting your hands dirty. Ultra-Quiet Operation The stick vacuum cleaner operates at less than 63 dB(A), no need to worry about disturbing your families or pets.

Can the charger adapter support 220V volts? The adapter is a 2 prong charger, it can be used for 110V -220V volts. Can I leave the battery plugged in/charging until I need it? Will it overcharge and damage it? The battery must be charged by the original adapter only , and it will automatically protect against overcharging after fully charged. Other chargers cannot be used in this way to avoid risks. Can the battery last for 50 minutes? The vacuum cleaner will work up to 50 mins on low speed, 25-30 mins on medium speed and 15-20 mins on Max speed. The working time is tested by hand vacuum, working time will also depend on different the floor types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I utilized this device on a variety of surfaces, ranging from carpets to hard floors, and it provided an excellent degree of suction force across the board. I was able to simply remove even the most tenacious pet hair and detritus from my floors because of the suction capabilities, which guaranteed that my floors were pristine. A significant contribution to the total efficiency was made by the brushless motor, which maintained a steady and dependable level of cleaning performance. It is my opinion that the fact that this cordless vacuum has a runtime of fifty minutes is a considerable benefit. The fact that I was able to cover a significant region without having to recharge it often was made possible by it. I was able to monitor the remaining runtime and schedule my cleaning sessions appropriately thanks to the LED display that indicated the remaining battery life. This was a great innovation included in the product. When compared to other vacuum cleaners, this function provides an additional degree of convenience that is sometimes ignored. It is my opinion that the fact that this vacuum cleaner has eight different functions makes it more versatile. It is appropriate for a wide variety of cleaning duties because of the many attachments and configurations that it offers, which include the ability to reach tight corners and tackle surfaces that are above the floor. When used for lengthy periods of time, the lightweight structure made it simple to carry and move, which reduced the amount of weariness experienced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent seller support, looks/works great
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the orange vacuum but received blue & white, so I reached out to the seller. It turned out to be a mistake on Amazon’s part; the color sticker on the box was white rather than orange. They were super easy to communicate with, responded quickly, and I had the orange vacuum at my door 3 days after reaching out. It was very simple to assemble, and I like that it comes with a wall mount to hold the vacuum and accessories it comes with. I just used it to vacuum my tiled living room, kitchen, and hallways, and I was able to get those areas done on medium speed with just the 50-ish percent battery life it came charged with. I really like the light feature on the front of the vacuum which helps me see the dust on the floor. It’s been on the charger for about 30mins and is at 37 percent. I will update this review after I use it on my LVP floors and my rugs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It Works! As Advertised!
reviews.reviewText: I’m pleased that it performs pretty much as advertised. I haven’t pushed it to the limits of battery time, so that’s a positive. It starts on the medium setting, which is mostly sufficient for my needs. Sometimes there are stubborn bits on a rug, so I’ll switch to high, which isn’t always effective, but overall is fine. I’m always amazed at the amount of stuff in the cup. Our cat is a Major contributor, and this thing seems to pick up his fur easily.Every once in a while, the rollers will lift up a small rug, and they will turn off. It’s an easy restart to get over that.I enjoy the portability, and ease of pushing the head under furniture. No report on using the shortened version. I use another portable for those jobs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dad's New Cleaning Sidekick!
reviews.reviewText: I recently surprised my dad with the FABULETTA Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, and it's safe to say he's found a new cleaning companion he can't stop raving about!The 250W/24Kpa powerful suction is a game-changer for our home. Dad has been impressed with its ability to effortlessly handle pet hair and tackle messes on both hard floors and carpets. It's become his go-to solution for maintaining a clean and pet-friendly environment.With an impressive 43-minute runtime, this vacuum allows Dad to cover a lot of ground without constantly interrupting his cleaning flow. The ultra-lightweight design is a big plus, making it easy for him to navigate around furniture and clean hard-to-reach spots.The 6-in-1 functionality is a standout feature. Dad loves how easily it transforms to adapt to different surfaces and cleaning needs. From floors to corners to upholstery, this vacuum has proven to be a versatile and reliable tool.The sleek blue design adds a stylish touch to our cleaning arsenal, and the build quality feels sturdy and durable.In summary, the FABULETTA Cordless Vacuum Cleaner has quickly become an essential part of Dad's cleaning routine. If you're looking for a powerful, lightweight, and versatile vacuum, this one gets a solid thumbs up from both Dad and me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little thing!
reviews.reviewText: I have never Owed a stick vacuum. This thing is incredible. I vacuumed a little rug and it sucked up the hair that my big vacuum cleaner never got would highly recommend it light easy and it’s got some suction power. I would give it a 10 stars but they don’t offer it well worth every penny, I spent on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Versatile Rechargeable Vacuum
reviews.reviewText: This rechargeable vacuum has the most incredible suction power I have come across. It is very compact and versatile. By removing one of the suction tunes, the vacuum becomes a smaller version of itself and can be used to vacuum the stairs, your car, or a small area that is hard to reach. I love that I can vacuum under my couch, under my table and chairs without having to move the furniture. This vacuum lays totally flat and can reach the farthest spot at the back of the sofa you would normally have to rearrange the house to get. This vacuum is very lightweight and easily maneuverable to empty or carry up a flight of stairs.

reviews.reviewTitle: Feels good and light in hand.
reviews.reviewText: So, this was my first day using the vacuum cleaner. The product has a look and feel of a good workmanship. I am not sure about the durability, because the plastic is very thin. Very easy to assembly and use. Gets under any furniture. Worked about 20 minutes on the medium power (which was enough to pickup the dust) before the battery was fully discharged. One full charge was enough for my 2 bedroom apartment that is about 750 square feet. A bit bigger surface will need to have a second fully charged battery on hand to have the work completed in one shot. I would recommend to clean the metal and Hepa filters after every use, or at least after every second use, because the dust might get further in and will need washing. By frequent cleaning you will extend between the wash cycle periods.Pros:Very low profile of the cleaning head, only 1.75", that easy to push under low clearance furniture.Picks up everything from the floating floor and the floorboard tops.The battery can be removed and charged separately.The battery is protected, because the unit will not power on when the battery is discharged.Easy to drop the debris or clean the filters. Light weight.Low noise level for a vacuum cleaner. Extendable main tube.The brush unit can turn 90 degrees by twistingLow price for the work it does.Cons:Very thin plastic that might crack easy if not handled gently.Thin sides on the flat nozzle and there is no place on the unit to attach it when not in use.Fast discharge if used on full power.
